Articles.Content: i just downloaded a craft linked to dropbox, and it came as a text file. im on a mac. how do i make it a .craft? (i cannot rename it to a .craft, as that just makes it like the title, .craft.txt.)
In finder, select the file, press command+i and remove the .txt from the name there. It'll probably ask you if you're sure, so make sure you click the correct choice.
You can just open it as a text document and over right a pervious ship, the overwritten ship will still be there. (you open both things as a text document.)
